评论概述: Really cuter then I expect quality issue.
评论详情: I was surprizing pleased with this purchase when it arrived.  It seemed well made and really cute.  Much different then the name brand poly nightgowns I was used to but I really liked it.  Yes, are pits could be a tad bigger but not tight or uncomfortable.  I bought medium and I'm on the smaller side of medium.  The fit otherwise is perfect.I have worn this off and on for four weeks and cool water washed it probably three times.  I hang it up to dry for fear of pits shrinking.  Now I notice one seams at the pit is coming unstitched as shown in photo.  My return window is still open so it's going back.  But...I like it enough that I will try it one more time if the price goes down because it's since gone up.There you have it!  I suggest it is worth trying but check all your seams when you get it.
Not sure I would buy another. Does not seem well made or durable.

This is really pretty and comfortable! The fabric isn’t 100% cotton, however, there is some polyester , I think 35%, but, it is still soft and breathable and beautiful for sleeping. Packs up small for traveling!

I absolutely love these! I got the red one and white floral but traded the white for the grey as it was see through. I bought them for pregnancy as nothing else feels good. However i did follow wash instructions and they did shrink which really sucks.  Length shrinkage i can deal with but the arm pit hole is now way too tight making it uncomfy.  I would recommend air dry or just tumble dry with no heat
Love love and love!! Fits true to size

I loved the material, style and pretty design.  It was longer than I expected. I’m 5’3’ and it almost touches the floor. That might be a consideration. The style helps to camouflage your bust if you prefer the modest coverage. I do love the gown.

Omg! FABULOUS Everything about this is fabulous! I'm in love with these. Comfortable and super attractive. The lace is a very beautiful crochet lace....The softness is beyond compare. I bought the red one and the green one. The colors are vibrant. The size spot on. The material is lightweight and cool. It's not stretchy, it's just pure soft cotton. The slash pockets on both sides are a nice addition. I can carry my cell phone and my tissues and even my remote in them. The mother of pearl buttons are nicely done and securely sewn on. I like the extra ruffle at the bottom of the skirt. It has a really nice full sweep. The length is perfect. I'm 5 ft 3 and it comes down to about 2 inches above my ankle. It's just a perfect comfortable soft nightgown that's very feminine. I bought two and I will be buying four more.

评论概述: Fabric is more like poly nylon than cotton.
评论详情: Fabric is more like poly nylon rather than cotton. If it was more cotton like a thick t-shirt material, I would have given a 4 star rating. The colour is rich. The pockets are shallow, suitable for small items like tissues. These are in the back of the drawer for emergency use only.

评论概述: Cotton breathable, slightly stretchy, extremely comfortable
评论详情: I cannot stand the garments that are partially made of that nasty spandex fabric.  This nightgown is cotton with a slight bit of stretch so as to make it very comfortable and easy to wear, kind of like a tee shirt, especially while sleeping.  It might have some spandex in it, but if so, it's a very small percentage.  This is cottony and comfortable, not slaggy and clingy.  It washes beautifully.  I always hang this up to dry rather than put through the dryer, though.  The pattern is adorable.  The buttons are real with real buttonholes.  The buttons have no bearing on how to put on or take off, so I just leave them buttoned.
I like the fabric and the pockets!

I bought this nightgown in the "mini green" color. It is a very bright kelly green. Pretty color. Just not the more subdued green I was expecting. I am impressed by the quality of the fabric, the softness, and the sizing. I am 5ft and 155lb. I ordered a XL because I wear a medium or large. But online shopping has got me in the habit of buying a size larger. I will say that this gown is true to size with a bit of room. So order the size you wear. And it will be just enough roomy so you don't get wound up in it at night. Or if you want an exact, more fitted feel. Order one size smaller than your usual size. It's comfortable and so pretty.
